name: Project Coreward
description:
Welcome to another galaxy. Project Coreward is an open world role playing adventure.

Upgrade your ship. Assemble and train its crew. Their mission? To survive, explore and eventually uncover the ancient choices that now weigh darkly on the fate of every world.

Project Coreward features an extensive galaxy created for VR. Guide your ship through the stars in 3rd person and explore large scale solar systems and vast, walkable planets. Recruit and exchange crewmembers, engage in diplomacy and combat, and upgrade your skills and your vessel to survive. Most of all, confront the unknown to reveal the true, vast nature of choice and consequence in a rich, hard sci-fi inspired storyline.

Project Coreward is inspired by the classic PC sandbox adventure, Starflight and is the work of a sole developer. It features approximately 10 hours of story driven gameplay, with a unique plotline and personality.
